roleset.name: convert into or enrich with minerals
roleset.note: MINERALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mineralize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, comparison with 'ionize.' (from mineralize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Unaccusative
example.text: In these caverns the bones are not mineralized.
